question.title: What are the clinical warning signs that prompt a colonoscopy to rule out organic disease?
question.description: Select the correct answer from the options below

option_a.title: Symptoms that appear after the age of 40
option_a.description: Symptoms that appear after the age of 40

option_b.title: Symptoms that appear after the age of 50 and include nocturnal symptoms
option_b.description: Symptoms that appear after the age of 50 and include nocturnal symptoms

option_c.title: Symptoms that appear after the age of 50, including weight loss and recent onset or modification of symptoms
option_c.description: Symptoms that appear after the age of 50, including weight loss and recent onset or modification of symptoms

option_d.title: Symptoms that appear after the age of 60 and include family history of colorectal cancer
option_d.description: Symptoms that appear after the age of 60 and include family history of colorectal cancer

correct_option.title: Symptoms that appear after the age of 50, including weight loss and recent onset or modification of symptoms
correct_option.description: Symptoms that appear after the age of 50, including weight loss and recent onset or modification of symptoms
